content.raw:
You use tabs instead of spaces here and in several part of the PR. 

Code in Gazebo follows a precise "style", as defined in http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=contrib_code . 
Unfortunately the standard `code_check.sh` is not Windows friendly, but (at least regarding tabs/spaces) you 
can directly check out the style guide at https://google.github.io/styleguide/cppguide.html#Spaces_vs._Tabs .
content.html:
You use tabs instead of spaces here and in several part of the PR.

Code in Gazebo follows a precise "style", as defined in http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=contrib_code . Unfortunately the standard code_check.sh is not Windows friendly, but (at least regarding tabs/spaces) you can directly check out the style guide at https://google.github.io/styleguide/cppguide.html#Spaces_vs._Tabs .
